016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.letsencrypt;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.spi.CertificatesProvider;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
021import jakarta.inject.Inject;
022import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
024import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Extension;
025import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.GeneralName;
026import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.GeneralNames;
027import org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException;
028import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest;
029import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
030import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
031import org.shredzone.acme4j.Certificate;
032import org.shredzone.acme4j.*;
033import org.shredzone.acme4j.challenge.Challenge;
034import org.shredzone.acme4j.challenge.Http01Challenge;
035import org.shredzone.acme4j.exception.AcmeException;
036import org.shredzone.acme4j.util.CSRBuilder;
037
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.security.*;
040import java.security.cert.CertificateException;
041import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
042import java.util.*;
043import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
044import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
045import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
046
047@Service(name = "letsencrypt")
048@ContractsProvided(CertificatesProvider.class)
049public class LetsEncryptCertificatesManagementProvider
050        implements CertificatesProvider {
051
052    private final LetsEncryptConfiguration letsEncryptConfiguration;
053    Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
054
055    private final KeyStores keyStores;
056    private final Account account;
057
058    private final Map<String, String> challengeTokens = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
059
060    @Inject
061    public LetsEncryptCertificatesManagementProvider(Configuration configuration, KeyStores keyStores) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, NoSuchProviderException, UnrecoverableKeyException, KeyStoreException, AcmeException, CertificateException, IOException, OperatorCreationException {
062        this.keyStores = keyStores;
063
064        letsEncryptConfiguration = new LetsEncryptConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("letsencrypt"));
065
066        KeyPair userKeyPair = keyStores.getOrCreateKeyPair("user", "letsencrypt");
067
068        Session session = new Session(letsEncryptConfiguration.getURL());
069        account = new AccountBuilder()
070                .agreeToTermsOfService()
071                .useKeyPair(userKeyPair)
072                .create(session);
073
074        logger.info("Account location:");
075        logger.info(account.getLocation());
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public CompletionStage<List<X509Certificate>> requestCertificates(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr) {
080
081        Collection<String> domains = new ArrayList<>();
082
083        GeneralNames generalNames = GeneralNames.getInstance(csr.getRequestedExtensions()
084                .getExtension(Extension.subjectAlternativeName)
085                .getExtnValue().getOctets());
086
087        // Only add DNS names. IP addresses are not supported by LetsEncrypt
088        domains.add(csr.getSubject().getRDNs()[0].getFirst().getValue().toString());
089        for (GeneralName name : generalNames.getNames()) {
090            if (name.getTagNo() == GeneralName.dNSName) {
091                domains.add(name.getName().toString());
092            }
093        }
094
095        try {
096            Order order = account.newOrder()
097                    .domains(domains)
098                    .create();
099
100            // Perform all required authorizations
101            for (Authorization auth : order.getAuthorizations()) {
102                authorize(auth);
103            }
104
105            // Generate a CSR for all of the domains,
106            // and sign it with the domain key pair.
107            CSRBuilder csrb = new CSRBuilder();
108            csrb.addDomains(domains);
109            csrb.sign(keyStores.getOrCreateKeyPair("domains", "letsencrypt"));
110            PKCS10CertificationRequest csr2 = csrb.getCSR();
111
112            // Order the certificate
113            order.execute(csr2.getEncoded());
114
115            // Wait for the order to complete
116            try {
117                int attempts = 10;
118                while (order.getStatus() != Status.VALID && attempts-- > 0) {
119                    // Did the order fail?
120                    if (order.getStatus() == Status.INVALID) {
121                        logger.error("Order has failed, reason: {}", order.getError());
122                        throw new AcmeException("Order failed... Giving up.");
123                    }
124
125                    // Wait for a few seconds
126                    Thread.sleep(3000L);
127
128                    // Then update the status
129                    order.update();
130                }
131            } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
132                logger.error("interrupted", ex);
133                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
134            }
135
136            // Get the certificate
137            Certificate certificate = order.getCertificate();
138
139            return CompletableFuture.completedStage(certificate.getCertificateChain());
140        } catch (Throwable e) {
141            return CompletableFuture.failedStage(e);
142        }
143    }
144
145    public String getHttpAuthorization(String id) {
146        return challengeTokens.get(id);
147    }
148
149    private void authorize(Authorization auth)
150            throws AcmeException {
151        logger.info("Authorization for domain {}", auth.getIdentifier().getDomain());
152
153        // The authorization is already valid.
154        // No need to process a challenge.
155        if (auth.getStatus() == Status.VALID) {
156            return;
157        }
158
159        // Find the desired challenge and prepare it.
160        List<Challenge> challenges = auth.getChallenges();
161        for (Challenge challenge : challenges) {
162            if (challenge.getStatus() == Status.VALID) {
163                // We're done
164                return;
165            }
166        }
167
168        // DNS challenges are all done offline, so HTTP challenges are the only ones
169        // that we could actually do here
170        Http01Challenge challenge = httpChallenge(auth);
171
172        if (challenge == null) {
173            throw new AcmeException("No challenge found");
174        }
175
176        // Now trigger the challenge.
177        challenge.trigger();
178
179        // Poll for the challenge to complete.
180        // TODO This should be replace with a Process
181        try {
182            int attempts = 10;
183            while (challenge.getStatus() != Status.VALID && attempts-- > 0) {
184                // Did the authorization fail?
185                if (challenge.getStatus() == Status.INVALID) {
186                    logger.error("Challenge has failed, reason: {}", challenge.getError());
187                    throw new AcmeException("Challenge failed... Giving up.");
188                }
189
190                // Wait for a few seconds
191                Thread.sleep(3000L);
192
193                // Then update the status
194                challenge.update();
195            }
196        } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
197            logger.error("interrupted", ex);
198            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
199        } finally {
200            challengeTokens.remove(challenge.getToken());
201        }
202
203        // All reattempts are used up and there is
204        // still no valid authorization?
205        if (challenge.getStatus() != Status.VALID) {
206            throw new AcmeException("Failed to pass the challenge for domain "
207                    + auth.getIdentifier().getDomain() + ", ... Giving up.");
208        }
209
210        logger.info("Challenge has been completed. Remember to remove the validation resource.");
211    }
212
213    public Http01Challenge httpChallenge(Authorization auth) throws AcmeException {
214        // Find a single http-01 challenge
215        Http01Challenge challenge = auth.findChallenge(Http01Challenge.class);
216        if (challenge == null) {
217            throw new AcmeException("Found no " + Http01Challenge.TYPE + " challenge, don't know what to do...");
218        }
219
220        logger.debug("Challenge token must be reachable at: http://{}/.well-known/acme-challenge/{}",
221                auth.getIdentifier().getDomain(), challenge.getToken());
222
223        challengeTokens.put(challenge.getToken(), challenge.getAuthorization());
224
225        return challenge;
226    }
227}
